parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From gramma. A writer, i.e. scribe or secretary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
A teacher, master. From didasko; an instructor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Well, nobly, honorably, rightly. Adverb from kalos; well.
